feed.title: SAP Community - SAP ERP
feed.subtitle: SAP ERP Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: VA35N layout different in S4 then ECC
entry.content:
Hello All.

In the migration from ECC to S4, the layout of some transactions have been changed. VA35N is one example. VL71, the output of it is also an example. 

Could you please let me know if there is something that can be done to revert that? 

Regards,

Leonardo Delgado

entry.title: Avoid accounting document while moving the stock from customer return stock
entry.content:
Currently, when customer returns are received, the stock is classified as customer stock. When we transfer the goods to unrestricted stock, it becomes our company’s stock. From there, we can proceed to scrap the goods if required.

In this process, the system generates two accounting documents:

When the stock is moved from customer (return) stock to unrestricted stock.

When the stock is moved from unrestricted stock to scrap.

We would like to know if there is any possibility to suppress the first accounting document (i.e., during the movement from customer return stock to unrestricted stock).

Can we get any SAP notes/ KBA, to get their confirmation on whether this is technically feasible or if it’s a standard system behavior that cannot be bypassed?

entry.title: Batch determination (different behavior between saved/released orders)
entry.content:
Hi everyone, I’m testing batch determination in production orders and noticed a difference between saved and released orders:

- When I save the first order, the selected batch is reserved. It is not proposed again in another order

- When I release the first order, the same batch is still proposed in a second order

So, the reservation only happens after saving, but not after releasing.

Can it be influenced through customizing? My goal is to make sure a batch cannot be assigned to multiple orders once it’s already used.

entry.title: Inquiry Regarding Removal of TCD: SU01 from Authorization Object S_TCODE
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support Personnel,

 

I would like to remove TCD: SU01 from the Authorization Object: S_TCODE for a specific role.
However, since the object containing TCD: SU01 is part of the standard configuration, it cannot be deleted directly.
I would appreciate your guidance on the following two points:

 

1.When Authorization Object: S_TCODE is standard, is removing the SU01 node from
PFCG > Menu > Hierarchy > Role Menu the only way to delete the transaction?

 

2.After removing the node and updating the profile, several authorization objects were added or suggested in the Authorization Data.
Could you please advise on a simple method to compare the authorizations before and after the profile update?

 

Thanks and best regards,
A.

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Mass maintenance catalog for business partners
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We’ve recently upgraded to the latest release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud public edition, and I’ve noticed that the business catalog for mass maintenance of business partners specifically SAP_CMD_BC_BP_MASSMAINT_PC is no longer available.

Does anyone know which catalog now provides similar functionality? If there’s a new way to identify successor catalogs for deprecated ones, I’d appreciate any tips on how to approach that search.

Thanks in advance!

Jack

entry.title: FX evaluation
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm looking for clarification on how ledger setup impacts foreign exchange evaluation in S/4HANA Cloud (3SL). Our customer prefers the classic method for FX revaluation, which typically aligns with ledger 0L. However, the implementation partner has activated ledger 4G to support advanced FX evaluation features.

Is it feasible to run classic FX evaluation on 0L while leveraging 4G for the advanced version? The partner believes this dual setup might satisfy both preferences, but we’d like to confirm whether such a configuration is technically supported.

Any insights would be greatly appreciated.

Jack

entry.title: cannot enter to PI Sheet(Loading data)
entry.content:
hello , expert

I have an issue to load PI sheet through CO60

I can access up to CO60, but after selecting the PI sheet and clicking on Display/Maintenance, it stays stuck on " loading data" as shown in the attached image. The log data indicates that the data was loaded successfully, but as you can see, it remains like this. 

How can i resolve this issue?

entry.title: Service Notification Task Long Text Timestamps
entry.content: How do I implement Service Notification Task Long Text timestamp/user information (Control Text) without locking out the Service Notification Long Text after a save state on the notification? Currently, I have a need to ingest data from the Service Notification Task Long Text through an integration with timestamp/user information from SAP. However, when I had implemented the Service Notification Control Text to support this need, end users were negatively impacted by the Service Notification Long Text becoming un-editable after inducing a save state on the Service Notification in IW52.

entry.title: When lowercase letters are entered as input in CONVERSION_EXIT_CUNIT_INPUT, no results appear.
entry.content:
When lowercase letters are entered as input in CONVERSION_EXIT_CUNIT_INPUT, no results appear.

Comocial unit(MSEH3) is 'kPU'.

Internal unit(MSEHI) is 'KPU'.

CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERSION_EXIT_CUNIT_INPUT'
EXPORTING
input = 'kPU'
language = sy-langu
IMPORTING
output = output_unit
EXCEPTIONS
unit_not_found = 1
OTHERS = 2.

When performing the above function, the output_unit has no value.

When debuging it, it seems that the input 'kPU' is being changed to ' KPU' when searching. Is this a bug?

The domain (MSEH3) is set to be case-sensitive.

entry.title: Mails nicht in der Warteschlange ; Status SO672
entry.content:
Mails in SOST werden sporadisch nicht in die Warteschlange gestellt und bekommen den Status SO672.

Betroffen sind ca 10% der ausgehenden Mails (externes Senden) , 90% , welche auf dem selben Weg erstellt werden, werden problemlos versendet.

Was kann die Ursache sein ?

Gibt es einen Report, der die Selektion von Mails , die zB seit 15 Minuten im Status Wartend ohne Eintrag in die Warteschlange sind und diese dann per "Senden wiederholen" in die Warteschlange stellt. Wenn nicht: Welche Tabellen müssen für die Selektion genutzt werden ?

We are facing an issue related to permissions. Is it possible to view changes in the same portlet during the approval through workflow without granting edit permission for the personal information section.

entry.title: SAP GUI 7.70 – Cannot Record Script or Capture Controls in PI Sheet
entry.content:
大家好，

我目前在Windows 11 Enterprise 23H2（Build 22631）上使用适用于 Windows 7.70（补丁级别 7）的 SAP GUI。脚本功能在大多数事务中都能正常工作——我可以毫无问题地录制脚本并获取控制 ID。

但是，当我打开PI 表时，脚本录制和回放功能会生成一个空白脚本。
没有任何操作或控件被录制，即使在其他事务中相同的功能运行正常。

有趣的是，我以前用旧版本（可能是相同的 GUI 版本，但补丁级别不同）在 PI Sheet 中成功录制了脚本。
这意味着系统和授权都正常——只是PI Sheet 脚本界面现在好像有点问题。

以下是我已经检查过的内容：

  • ✅ 客户端脚本已启用（Options > Accessibility & Scripting > Enable Scripting）

  • ✅ 服务器端参数sapgui/user_scripting = TRUE

  • 🖥️ 其他 SAP 交易（如 ME21N、CO03 等）可以毫无问题地记录

  • ⚠️ 只有PI Sheet无法生成任何脚本输出

我的问题是：
👉 这是某些 SAP GUI 7.70 补丁版本中的已知限制或错误吗？
👉 哪个补丁版本或配置允许再次使用 PI Sheet 脚本？
👉 我是否需要降级或升级 GUI（例如，补丁版本 15 或 GUI 8.00）？

任何建议或解决方法都将不胜感激！
提前谢谢您。

谨致问候，
Sosan

entry.title: SAP GUI 7.70 – Cannot Record Script or Capture Controls in PI Sheet
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m currently using SAP GUI for Windows 7.70 (Patch Level 7) on Windows 11 Enterprise 23H2 (Build 22631).
The scripting function works normally for most transactions — I can record scripts and get control IDs without any issue.

However, when I open a PI Sheet, the Script Recording and Playback feature produces a blank script.
No actions or controls are recorded, even though the same feature works fine in other transactions.

Interestingly, I used to record scripts in PI Sheet successfully with an older setup (probably the same GUI version but different patch level).
That means the system and authorization are fine — only the PI Sheet scripting interface seems broken now.

Here’s what I’ve already checked:

  • ✅ Client-side scripting is enabled (Options > Accessibility & Scripting > Enable Scripting)

  • ✅ Server-side parameter sapgui/user_scripting = TRUE

  • 🖥️ Other SAP transactions (like ME21N, CO03, etc.) can be recorded without any problem

  • ⚠️ Only PI Sheet fails to generate any script output

My question is:
👉 Is this a known limitation or bug in certain SAP GUI 7.70 patch levels?
👉 Which patch level or configuration allows PI Sheet scripting again?
👉 Do I need to downgrade or upgrade the GUI (e.g., Patch Level 15 or GUI 8.00)?

Any advice or workaround would be greatly appreciated!
Thank you very much in advance.

Best regards,
Sosan

entry.title: How to update “Display-only” material master fields (Gross/Net Weight) via MM17 or IDoc in S/4HANA?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am working in S/4HANA and I have a scenario with material master fields MARA-BRGEW (Gross Weight) and MARA-NTGEW (Net Weight).

  • In MM02, these fields are set to Display only via field selection (OMS9/OMS2).

  • I want to update these fields via MM17 (mass maintenance) or MATMAS IDoc.

  • Currently, SAP blocks the change and returns MG140: “Field not ready for input”.

I understand that SAP marks these fields as non-dialog in the backend, so the “Display only” status does not allow updates through direct input or IDocs.

My question:
Is there a standard / S/4HANA-supported way to update these display-only fields programmatically (via IDoc, MM17, or API), without changing the MM02 screen status?

entry.title: Career Advice: Choosing Between SAP Ariba, EWM, and PP
entry.content:
Hello, 

I’m an Industrial Engineer with no prior work experience, but I speak four languages — English, German, Turkish, and Arabic. I’ve recently completed hands-on training in SAP MM and am now planning to learn another SAP module to strengthen my career path.

My goal is to build a strong professional profile and find good job opportunities in the Gulf region, where SAP is in high demand. I want to choose a module that aligns with my industrial engineering background, complements my SAP MM knowledge, leverages my language skills, and offers long-term career stability — even with the growing impact of AI and automation.

Currently, I’m considering 1) SAP Ariba(e.g., Procurement, Supplier Management, Sourcing ..) and 2) SAP EWM. I am also thinking about SAP PP, but I believe its opportunities are limited, as it is mostly confined to the industrial sector. Additionally, I would like advice on whether to focus on Cloud Private Edition or On-Premise for SAP MM and the next module.

Which module and deployment type would you recommend to help me stay competitive and future-proof my career in the Gulf market?

Thank you very much for your advice!
